summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LocaTrack SuperAdmin and messaging features. Successfully verified SuperAdmin login, user management interface, messaging system with WhatsApp-style chat, and sound system disabled. All major features are working correctly with minor issues in new conversation button detection.

minor_issues.issue: 404 and 401 error responses not returning expected status codes
minor_issues.impact: Minor - core functionality works, only affects error edge cases

working_endpoints: SuperAdmin login with superadmin@locatrack.dz works correctly
/admin/users/{id} PUT endpoint for user updates works
/messages/users endpoint returns available users for chat

minor_ui_issues.issue: New conversation + button requires specific CSS selector to detect

working_features.verification: Successfully logged in with superadmin@locatrack.dz credentials
Stats cards displayed, user management interface functional, edit user modal works
Super Admin link appears in sidebar with amber/gold styling as required
WhatsApp-style interface, new conversation creation, message sending all functional
Messages button in sidebar, unread count badge system working
Edit user modal opens and closes properly, user list displays correctly

passed_tests: SuperAdmin role display in sidebar with crown icon
Super Admin navigation link with amber/gold styling
SuperAdmin page loads with stats cards (Total Users: 8, Admins: 1, Employees: 5, Vehicles: 5)
User management interface with edit/delete buttons
Edit user modal functionality (opens and closes properly)
Messages page WhatsApp-style layout (sidebar + chat area)
New conversation creation with user selection dialog
Conversation appears in sidebar with message preview
Messages button in sidebar with proper styling
Sound system properly disabled (no sound-related errors)
Role-based access control working (SuperAdmin can access admin endpoints)
User update functionality through SuperAdmin interface
